segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is turning into a soggy disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink overflow is just gross, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman keeps drying her plate, ignoring the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle—yuck, she'll ruin her shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are dripping; what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boy is filthy hands in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks dirty and unstable too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's probably dropping crumbs all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, eager for her share—messy business.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking cookies like that, so unsanitary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor puddle is spreading, slippery and nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside garden is clean, but inside? Revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to clean this up immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR
